I suggest that if Frau Tsai is going to introduce German culture...etc, you can speak not only German but also Chinese or English. We are interested in what you said, but sometimes you speak too fast in German so we can't understand.
希望老師可以多補充一些內容 也希望能給我們更多機會開口說
